how are you setting the options?
modprobe saa7134 options card=2 tuner=2
when you want to change them, rmmod saa7134 and do another modprobe
oh ok ... thanks ... and that takes immediate effect ? for the next time i load up tvtime ?
yep, when you rmmod it you're unloading the module, so the next modprobe can set new options
